long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A chrome extension for flair recruiting app
A Chrome extension that streamlines the talent/candidate creation process in flair Recruiting. With just a few clicks, you can save candidate information directly to your flair account without navigating away from the page you are on. Save time and efficiently manage your recruitment process with this extension.
